amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to extend authority of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to enter into cost recovery agreements for evaluation and processing of permits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Denham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
